material.mattext: State the appropriate hypotheses for the chi-square test for independence in this case.

Ho: There is no relationship between risk of alcohol problems and participation in the 911 rescue. Ha: There is a significant relationship between risk of alcohol problems and participation in the 911 rescue. OR Ho: Risk of alcohol problems and participation in the 911 rescue are independent. Ha: Risk of alcohol problems and participation in the 911 rescue are not independent.
